scripts.dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=dev dotenv -e .env.dev -- ts-node-dev --respawn --transpile-only --exit-child --ignore-watch node_modules src/server.ts
scripts.preprod: cross-env NODE_ENV=prod dotenv -e .env -- prisma migrate deploy
scripts.prod: cross-env NODE_ENV=prod dotenv -e .env -- pm2 start --name api-rest-prisma -i 2 dist/src/server.js
scripts.dev:migrate: cross-env NODE_ENV=dev dotenv -e .env.dev -- npx prisma migrate dev
scripts.pretest: cross-env NODE_ENV=test dotenv -e .env.test -- npx prisma migrate dev
scripts.dev:studio: cross-env NODE_ENV=dev dotenv -e .env.dev -- npx prisma studio
scripts.dev:seed: cross-env NODE_ENV=dev dotenv -e .env.dev -- npx prisma db seed
